name: BitRay2
description: BitRay 2 - is a simple puzzle game in which your task is to destroy all the black cubes, and do so all the white appeared on the white platform.
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsXP + 7/8/10 Processor: 1.2GHz or faster processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Video card must be 512 MB or more and should be a DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: Mouse

reviews.review_text: Nice & challenging puzzles that get harder every time you level up!  10/10
